mode.description: mode of activation: immediate (on message rx), scheduled_absolute (when internal clock >= scheduled_time), scheduled_relative (when internal clock >= time of message rx + scheduled_time)

scheduled_time.description: String formatted TAI timestamp (<seconds>:<nanoseconds>) indicating time (absolute or relative) for activation

status.description: activation status (populated by system - pending on message reception, success once activation successfully completed, fail if activation failed)
